tabs.system.settings.information.title: Information
tabs.system.settings.password.title: Password settings
tabs.system.settings.userpolicy.title: User policies
security.message.error.title: Security Error!
settings.message.error.title: Settings Error!
system_settings_information_title_desc: Enter company-related information, which can be used in notifications.
system_settings_password_title_desc: Customize the security policies for the password.
system_settings_password_form_includeUpp: Requires the password to contain at least one capital letter.
system_settings_password_form_includeNum: Requires the password to contain at least one number.
system_settings_password_form_notInclude: Do not include the user code
The password must not include the user code.
Do not include the user code backwards
Validate that the password does not include the user's code in reverse.
system_settings_userpolicy_title_desc: Customize the following security policies for users using the Byte security platform.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_maxFailL: Specify the number of failed login attempts, before blocking the user.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_historyV: Specify the number of last passwords that cannot be repeated.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_userInac: Specify the number of days that must pass to block the user for inactivity.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_password: Specify the number of days for passwords associated with user accounts to expire.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_automati: Specify the number of minutes it takes for an account to be automatically unlocked.
system_settings_userpolicy_form_manageAc: Enable the option if you want to use email sending for user account management
system_settings_mail_title_desc: Enter the information related to the email service that the application will use
notification.mail.from.address.suggest: Email address that the application will use to send emails.
notification.mail.server.suggest: Name or IP address of the SMTP server.
notification.mail.test.title: Mail configuration validation
notification.mail.test.suggest: This section allows you to validate the mail settings before being saved.
notification.mail.test.recipients.sugges: Enter one or more destination emails and press the "Send email" button.
application.title: Application maintenance
application_generated_secret_message: Are you sure you want to generate a new secret?
